788310.name: Shallow Swing
788310.description:
Are you ok Bubbles? You look a bit like... shrinking?!
-------------------------------------

Shallow Swing is a little puzzling story of a little square named Bubbles.
She likes to travel, but it is a rough world out there. She takes a breath and tries to reach the next exit.
Next level...
Next life...



Join Bubbles in this tiny adventure and see if you can breath at the right time. ;)

-------------------------------------

Shallow Swing is a minimalistic puzzle platformer.
Plan your route and drive carefully.

-------------------------------------

All soundtrack playlist by Kevin MacLeod
